sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-autocomplete  label="Tag" v-model="friends" :items="people" filled chips color="blue-grey lighten-2" item-text="name" item-value="name" multiple>
        <template v-slot:selection="data">
            <v-chip v-bind="data.attrs" :input-value="data.selected" close @click="data.select" @click:close="remove(data.item)">{{ data.item }}</v-chip>
        </template>
        <template v-slot:item="data">
            <template v-if="typeof data.item !== 'object'">
                <v-list-item-content v-text="data.item"></v-list-item-content>
            </template>
            <template v-else>
                <v-list-item-content>
                    <v-list-item-title v-html="data.item"></v-list-item-title>
                </v-list-item-content>
            </template>
        </template>
    </v-autocomplete>
</template>
<script>
  export default {
    data () {
      return {
        autoUpdate: true,
        friends: ['Sandra Adams', 'Britta Holt'],
        people: ['Sandra Adams','Ali Connors','Trevor Hansen','Tucker Smith','Britta Holt','Jane Smith ','John Smith','Sandra Williams'],
      }
    },
    methods: {
      remove (item) {
        const index = this.friends.indexOf(item)
        if (index >= 0) this.friends.splice(index, 1)
      },
    },
  }
</script>
